mapper.sql: select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, menu_weight, route_address, component_path, route_parameter, is_frame, is_cache, menu_type, menu_display, menu_status, ifnull(menu_perms,'') as menu_perms, menu_icon, create_time from bytesmart_menu
mapper.select: select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.route_address, m.component_path, m.route_parameter, m.menu_display, m.menu_status, ifnull(m.menu_perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.menu_type, m.menu_icon, m.menu_weight, m.create_time from bytesmart_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.menu_status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.menu_weight

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.route_address, m.component_path, m.route_parameter, m.menu_display, m.menu_status, ifnull(m.menu_perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.menu_type, m.menu_icon, m.menu_weight, m.create_time from bytesmart_menu m left join bytesmart_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join bytesmart_employee_role er on rm.role_id = er.role_id left join bytesmart_role r on er.role_id = r.role_id left join bytesmart_employee e on er.employee_id = e.employee_id where e.employee_id = #{employeeId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.menu_status = 0 AND r.role_status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.menu_weight
select distinct m.menu_perms from bytesmart_menu m left join bytesmart_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join bytesmart_employee_role er on rm.role_id = er.role_id

select distinct m.menu_perms from bytesmart_employee_role er LEFT JOIN bytesmart_role r ON er.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN bytesmart_role_menu rm ON er.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN bytesmart_menu m ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where employee_id = #{employeeId} and m.menu_status = '0' and r.role_status = '0'
select distinct m.menu_perms from bytesmart_menu m left join bytesmart_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where m.menu_status = '0' and rm.role_id = #{roleId}
select count(1) from bytesmart_menu where parent_id = #{menuId}
mapper.insert: insert into bytesmart_menu( menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, menu_weight, route_address, component_path, route_parameter, is_frame, is_cache, menu_type, menu_display, menu_status, menu_perms, menu_icon, remark, create_by, create_time )values( #{menuId}, #{parentId}, #{menuName}, #{menuWeight}, #{routeAddress}, #{componentPath}, #{routeParameter}, #{isFrame}, #{isCache}, #{menuType}, #{menuDisplay}, #{menuStatus}, #{menuPerms}, #{menuIcon}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
